## Data
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data <- read.csv('death_gdp.csv')
```

## Statistical Test

```{r}
model <- lm(gdp.change ~ death.ratio, data)
```

```{r}
summary(model)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(gdp.change, death.ratio, label = country)) +
  geom_point(aes(colour = country))  + geom_text(check_overlap = TRUE,aes(colour = country)) 

```
